articles.author: Gabriel Gavin
articles.title: Putin admits Russia doesn't have enough weapons and drones - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Moscow’s forces have been plagued by shortages, while Kyiv is taking delivery of advanced Western hardware.
articles.content: Russian President Vladimir Putin has warned that his armed forces lack the military hardware they need to win the war in Ukraine, while insisting Moscow is ramping up weapons production to fill the g… [+1573 chars]
